title: AI comes for the job market, security, and prosperity: The Debrief
summary: When I picked up my daughter from summer camp, we settled in for an eight-hour drive through the Appalachian mountains, heading from North Carolina to her grandparents’ home in Kentucky. title: Designing better products with AI and sustainability
summary: On a mission to reduce the environmental impact of manufacturing components, Siemens turned its attention to the design of a robot gripper. title: Open the pod bay doors, Claude
